Translations.Text: O vos believe vos reverence DEUS seek via means Eum strive His causa ut vos succeed

Certainly those disbelieved they possessed everything terra et twice prout much offered it prout ransom spare them retribution Feria Resurrection it non accepted them; they incurred painful retribution
They want exit Hell alas they nunquam exit therefrom their retribution est eternal
thief vir femina vos signum their manus punishment their crime ac serve prout example DEUS. DEUS est Almighty Wise
Si 1 repents post committing hoc crime reforms DEUS redeems eum! DEUS est Forgiver Merciful
Vos non know ut DEUS perfecit possesses sovereignty de caelum terra? He punishes whomever He testimentum forgives whomever He testimentum! DEUS est Omnipotent

O vos messenger non saddened those hasten disbelieve among those dictus Nos believe their mouths dum their hearts non believe Among Jews some listened to lies They listened to people nunquam met vos qui distorted words context tunc dictus vos dedit hoc accept it vos dedit anything different beware Whomever DEUS testimentum divert vos perfecit nihil help eum DEUS! DEUS NON wish PURGATUS their hearts They incurred humiliation in hoc saeculum in Hereafter they suffer terrible retribution

They est upholders lies eaters illicit earnings they advenit vos scabinus them vos scabinus them vos disregard them! Vos choose disregard them they non harm vos in the parvus Si vos scabinus them vos scabinus equitably. DEUS loves those est equitable
Why they ask vos perfecit scabinus them when they habet Torah containing deus juris they chose disregard it They non est believers
